subject: Santander Consumer USA Inc.
body:
Santander Consumer USA Inc.
P.O. Box 961245
Attention,
This is Mr Simon Mark the Bank Manager of USA Santander Bank,Am here
to update you about your compensation funds amounted at $3.500.000.00
which was deposited from the Benin Republic president/Government as
your scam victim compensation due to 
your email and your information
appeared on the scam victim list means that you got scammed in the
Africa while the president is trying to compensation all the scam
victims and the government has paid all the fee to get the funds to
you accept the bank re-activation fee $50 Apple card or Steam wallet
which must be done before the transfers.
 I know you might not know
reason why i am seriously on this issue of your funds compensation.
It is because that i am going to be transfer to one of branch in
Germany to complete some works as bank manager of the Santander USA,
So for that is  why am trying all my best to make sure that all job i
hold at hand will finish before will left Monday next week. And the
parcel i have at hand now to deliver /transfer to their inheritor
remain only your fund $3.500.000.00 before i will be transfer like i
stated above.Therefore i want to help both you with my personal
ability to make sure that you receive your funds before i will leave
by Tomorrow , Due to i have no more time on this office, I will be
asking you to choose the 2 fastest ways to get this compensation to
you with below option,
1. Sending $3.500.000.00 from our Online bitcoin account to your
bitcoin wallet account.
2.By uploading the $3.500.000.00 to ATM visa card and ship to you through DHL.
Finally note that all this ways/process will still cost you $50.00
apple gift card or steam wallet only for the activation fee and it
will be paid by itune card which you need to send immediately. Urgent
contact on whats App  below: +22961944255
USA Santander Consumer Bank manager
Mr Simon Mark

subject: Re: Santander Consumer USA Inc.
body:
Dear Mr. Simon Mark,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your efforts in trying to resolve this issue before your transfer to Germany.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. Could you please provide more details about the scam incident you mentioned? As far as I'm aware, I haven't been involved in any scams recently.

Also, could you please explain why an Apple gift card or Steam wallet is required for the activation fee? It seems unusual that a bank would request payment through these methods.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kevin
